mapper.insert: insert into cw_alarm_record ( alarmId, alarmName, tipFlag, voiceFlag, colorCode, voiceUrl, monitorId, monitorCode, monitorName, monitorType, monitorProperty, topn, alarmScore, captureId, captureTime, alarmTime, deviceId, deviceNo, deviceCode, deviceType, deviceName, deviceAddress, lng, lat, panoramaId, captureUrlFull, panoramaUrlFull, remark, createTime, score, registerUrl, regId, regdb, regdbId, regdbName, monitorUserName, name, cardId, birthday, cardGender, gender, age, ageGroup, ageGroupName, maskState, glassesState, sunGlassesState, minority, pitch, yaw, roll, cardNation )values( #{alarmId}, #{alarmName}, #{tipFlag}, #{voiceFlag}, #{colorCode}, #{voiceUrl}, #{monitorId}, #{monitorCode}, #{monitorName}, #{monitorType}, #{monitorProperty}, #{topn}, #{alarmScore}, #{captureId}, #{captureTime}, #{alarmTime}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceNo}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceAddress}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{panoramaId}, #{captureUrlFull}, #{panoramaUrlFull}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{score}, #{registerUrl}, #{regId}, #{regdb}, #{regdbId}, #{regdbName}, #{monitorUserName}, #{name}, #{cardId}, #{birthday}, #{cardGender}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{ageGroup}, #{ageGroupName}, #{maskState}, #{glassesState}, #{sunGlassesState}, #{minority}, #{pitch}, #{yaw}, #{roll}, #{cardNation} )

insert into cw_alarm_record( alarmId, alarmName, tipFlag, voiceFlag, colorCode, voiceUrl, monitorId, monitorCode, monitorName, monitorType, monitorProperty, topn, alarmScore, captureId, captureTime, alarmTime, deviceId, deviceNo, deviceCode, deviceType, deviceName, deviceAddress, lng, lat, panoramaId, captureUrlFull, panoramaUrlFull, age, gender, maskState, glassesState, sunGlassesState, minority, pitch, yaw, roll, remark, createTime, monitorUserName) values (#{alarmId}, #{alarmName}, #{tipFlag}, #{voiceFlag}, #{colorCode}, #{voiceUrl}, #{monitorId}, #{monitorCode}, #{monitorName}, #{monitorType}, #{monitorProperty}, #{topn}, #{alarmScore}, #{captureId}, #{captureTime}, #{alarmTime}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceNo}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceAddress}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{panoramaId}, #{captureUrlFull}, #{panoramaUrlFull}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{maskState}, #{glassesState}, #{sunGlassesState}, #{minority}, #{pitch}, #{yaw}, #{roll}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{monitorUserName} )
